sense.gloss: heavy smoker, habitual smoker, person who loves smoking, tobacco lover

sdata.j: ↑叔父↑↓おじ↓は↑大↑↓だい↓の|↑愛煙↑↓あいえん↓↑家|↑↓か↓です。↑彼↑↓かれ↓にとってタバコは↑欠↑↓か↓くことができない。
sdata.e: My uncle is a very heavy smoker; tobacco is indispensable to him.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|↑愛煙↑↓あいえん↓↑家|↑↓か↓ですね。
sdata.e: He's a heavy smoker, isn't he?
